
##

## Objetive
Understand how jekyll works and personal Resume

## Install 
``` bash
gem install jekyll bundler

jekyll new nameofyoursite
```
### Config the ruby version

```bash 
# Config for RVM
touch .ruby-version
touch .ruby-gemset

#List Ruby version installed
rvm list
rvm use ruby-3.3.1

```
### Start server
```bash 
bundle exec jekyll serve
```
